events.message: Customer reported a collision involving their car and a streetlight causing significant front-end damage.
The claim has been classified under Auto Accident due to vehicle collision details provided by the customer.
An insurance agent has been assigned to handle this auto accident claim and coordinate with the claimant.
Acknowledged receipt of the claim filed for the car accident and assured customer of prompt assistance.
Requested photographs of the damaged vehicle and a police report to proceed with the investigation.
Customer successfully submitted all requested documents including photos, repair estimates, and police report.
Investigation into the details of the car accident has commenced to assess liability and extent of damages.
Completed investigation confirming the policy covers the type of collision and damages reported in the claim.
A settlement offer has been prepared based on repair estimates and policy terms and sent to the customer.
Customer responded positively to the proposed settlement and expressed satisfaction with the handling process.
The claim was officially approved by the claims department following customer acceptance of the settlement.
Payment for the approved claim amount was issued directly to the customerâ€™s bank account promptly.
Case has been closed following complete resolution and payment issuance for the vehicle accident claim.
All records related to the accident claim have been archived for future reference and compliance purposes.
